summary: The team discussed data model changes and deployment timing for a Salesforce implementation. Key focus was on collateral types, scoring models, and lead source configurations. The discussion centered around whether to push forward with current changes or wait to incorporate all updates.
decisions: Decided to proceed with deployment without waiting for all changes
Confirmed that 'other' collateral type doesn't need to be sent for scoring
Agreed to handle opportunity records in phase two

action_items.task: Provide answers to Laura's questions by end of day
Add picklist for other collateral types

concerns: Potential breaking of scoring model with undefined values
Impact of data model changes on existing validations
Dependencies between new features and data model changes
michael_priorities: Ensuring scoring model wouldn't break with collateral type 'other'
Maintaining forward progress without unnecessary delays
Understanding the structure of collateral objects and types

commitments.commitment: Will provide answers to questions today
Will implement straightforward collateral type changes
